response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession but a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its worth extends far beyond what meets the eye, potentially offering you unparalleled benefits or experiences. Considering its significance, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $850,000. This is an exceptional deal, considering the potential value it could bring to you. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we might make this transaction mutually beneficial. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 850000}
